p: Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) has been used for thousands of years by different generations in China and other Asian countries as foods to promote good health and as drugs to treat diseases. It has been widely used in Asian countries such as China, Japan, Korea, Vietnam, and Thailand for many years. Wolfberry is widely distributed in the arid and semi-arid regions of China, Japan, Korea, Europe, North America and the Mediterranean. The northwest regions of China are main producing areas of L. barbarum, including Xinjiang, Tibet, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Qinghai and Gansu.
